bibl.title: Territory of Washington v James Sheridan. Affidavit
bibl.note: Our transcription is based on a digital image of the microfilmed original.

div1.p: S. B. Fargo a/p and affidavit
Filed May 6th, 1893 B. N. Sexton Clerk by L. E. Rector Deputy Clerk
Territory of Washington County of Walla Walla } ss
Territory of Washington vs James Sheridan
In the W. J. District Court First Judicial District W. J.

For the attendance upon the said court as witness from the First day of the term, to wit- the 27th day of April A. D. 1863, until the 6th day of May A. D. 1863, at $2.00 pery day, amounting to nine days
Territory of Washington County of Walla Walla } ss

Personally appeared before the undersigned clerk of the District Court 1st Judicial District W. J. S. B. Fargo, and being duly sworn says the above account is just and correct, and that he attended as witness as stated,
Subscribed and sworn to before me this 6th day of May A. D. 1863
B. N. Sexton Clerk by L. E. Rector Deputy Clerk
